idea-plugin.name: REST API Client Code Generator
idea-plugin.description: A JetBrains Rider extension for generating REST API clients from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications. This extension provides context menu options to generate client code using various generators: - NSwag - Refitter - OpenAPI Generator - Microsoft Kiota - Swagger Codegen CLI - AutoREST
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release of the REST API Client Code Generator for JetBrains Rider.
